title: Signs as subgroup of the complex numbers

blocks.name: cnmsgnsubg
blocks.content: The signs form a multiplicative subgroup of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmsgnsubg(class c0) {

  -| wceq(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))

  syl6eqel(cv(hs0), cc, cneg(nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), wne(cv(hs0), nat0), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1))))

  eqnetrd(cv(hs0), nat0, nat1, wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wne(nat1, nat0))
  eqnetrd(cv(hs0), nat0, cneg(nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1)))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1)), wne(cneg(nat1), nat0))
  neg1ne0()
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1))), wo(wceq(cv(hs1), nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cneg(nat1))))
  elpri(cv(hs1), nat1, cneg(nat1))

  eqeltri(co(nat1, cmul, nat1), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), nat1)
  mulid1i(nat1)
  syl6eqel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, nat1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1)), wceq(cv(hs1), nat1)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1), cv(hs1), nat1, cmul)
  eqeltri(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, nat1), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cneg(nat1))
  mulid1i(cneg(nat1))
  syl6eqel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), co(nat1, cmul, cneg(nat1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wceq(cv(hs1), cneg(nat1))))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), nat1, cv(hs1), cneg(nat1), cmul)
  eqeltri(co(nat1, cmul, cneg(nat1)), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cneg(nat1))
  mulid2i(cneg(nat1))
  neg1cn()
  syl6eqel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cneg(nat1))))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1), cv(hs1), cneg(nat1), cmul)
  eqeltri(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), nat1)
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1))))
  elpri(cv(hs0), nat1, cneg(nat1))

blocks.name: cnmsgnbas
blocks.content: The base set of the sign subgroup of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmsgnbas(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cc))
  mp2an(wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cc), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  ax-1cn()
  neg1cn()
  prssi(nat1, cc, cneg(nat1))
  ressbas2(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cc, c0, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  mgpbas(cc, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  cnfldbas()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnmsgnbas(class c0) {
  ⊢ { 1, -u(1)} =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c0 =((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})
} = {
  ax-mp({ 1, -u(1)} =(Base ` c0), { 1, -u(1)} ⊆ ℂ)
  mp2an({ 1, -u(1)} ⊆ ℂ, 1 ∈ ℂ, -u(1)∈ ℂ)
  ax-1cn()
  neg1cn()
  prssi(nat1, cc, -u(1))
  ressbas2({ 1, -u(1)}, cc, c0, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  mgpbas(cc, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  eqid((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  cnfldbas()
}

blocks.name: cnmsgngrp
blocks.content: The group of signs under multiplication. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmsgngrp(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, cgrp)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
} = {
  ax-mp(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(csubg, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))
  cnmsgnsubg(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  subggrp(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), c0)
  eqtr4i(c0, co(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)))), wcel(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), universe), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  difexi(cc, csn(nat0))
  cnex()
  mp2an(wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(nat1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(nat1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(nat1, cc), wne(nat1, nat0))
  ax-1cn()
  ax-1ne0()
  eldifsn(nat1, cc, nat0)
  mpbir2an(wcel(cneg(nat1), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc), wne(cneg(nat1), nat0))
  neg1cn()
  neg1ne0()
  eldifsn(cneg(nat1), cc, nat0)
  prssi(nat1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cneg(nat1))
  ressabs(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), universe, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))

thm cnmsgngrp(class c0) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈ Grp
  ⊣ c0 =((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})
} = {

  cnmsgnsubg(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](ℂ \ { 0 })))
  eqid(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](ℂ \ { 0 })))
  subggrp({ 1, -u(1)}, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](ℂ \ { 0 })), c0)
  eqtr4i(c0, (((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](ℂ \ { 0 }))[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  mp2an((((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](ℂ \ { 0 }))[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})=((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), (ℂ \ { 0 })∈ 𝕌, { 1, -u(1)} ⊆(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  difexi(cc, { 0 })
  cnex()
  mp2an({ 1, -u(1)} ⊆(ℂ \ { 0 }), 1 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), -u(1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  mpbir2an(1 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), 1 ∈ ℂ, 1 ≠ 0)
  ax-1cn()
  ax-1ne0()
  eldifsn(nat1, cc, nat0)
  mpbir2an(-u(1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), -u(1)∈ ℂ, -u(1)≠ 0)
  neg1cn()
  neg1ne0()
  eldifsn(-u(1), cc, nat0)
  prssi(nat1, (ℂ \ { 0 }), -u(1))
  ressabs((ℂ \ { 0 }), universe, { 1, -u(1)}, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c4 `(c1 ∘ c3))=((c4 ` c1)[×](c4 ` c3)))
  ⊣ c5 =(SymGrp ` c0)

  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c5)
} = {
  eqtr3d((c4 `(c1 ∘ c3)), ((c4 ` c1)[×](c4 ` c3)), (c4 `(c1[(+ ` c5)]c3)), (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  fveq2d(c4, (c1[(+ ` c5)]c3), (c1 ∘ c3), (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[(+ ` c5)]c3)=(c1 ∘ c3))
  symgov(c1, c2, c3, (+ ` c5), c5, c0)
  syl3an1(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c4 `(c1[(+ ` c5)]c3))=((c4 ` c1)[×](c4 ` c3)), c4 ∈(c5[GrpHom]((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})))
  psgnghm2(c0, c4, c5, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))

  eqid((+ ` c5))
  ax-mp(× =(+ `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})), { 1, -u(1)} ∈ 𝕌)
  prex(nat1, -u(1))
  ressplusg({ 1, -u(1)}, universe, cmul, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), (mulGrp ` CCfld))
